scripts.write-zuul:
printf "ui: tape
tunnel: ngrok
browsers:
  - name: $BROWSER_NAME
    version: $BROWSER_VERSION
">.zuul.yml

scripts.ci: tap test/parallel/*.js test/ours/*.js --tap | tee test.tap && node test/verify-dependencies.js
tap test/parallel/*.js test/ours/*.js --tap | tee test.tap && node test/verify-dependencies.js
